greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) of orders of degree-n irreducible polynomials over GF(17) listed in ascending order.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..19, flattened
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Irreducible Polynomial
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Polynomial Order
formula: T(n,k) = k-th smallest element of M(n) = {d : d|(17^n-1)} \ U(n-1) with U(n) = M(n) union U(n-1) if n>0, U(0) = {}.
maple: M:= proc(n) M(n):= divisors(17^n-1) minus U(n-1) end:
U:= proc(n) U(n):= `if`(n=0, {}, M(n) union U(n-1)) end:
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 26 2012
